patch:
@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ android {
     buildToolsVersion "30.0.1"
 
     defaultConfig {
-        applicationId "ru.geekbrains.lesson1"
+        applicationId "ru.geekbrains.calculator"
         minSdkVersion 23
         targetSdkVersion 29
         versionCode 1

@@ -1,26 +1,21 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
-    package="ru.geekbrains.lesson1">
+    package="ru.geekbrains.calculator">
 
     <application
         android:allowBackup="true"
         android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
         android:label="@string/app_name"
         android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
         android:supportsRtl="true"
-        android:theme="@style/Theme.Lesson1">
-        <activity android:name=".TwoActivity"></activity>
+        android:theme="@style/Theme.Calculator">
         <activity android:name=".MainActivity">
             <intent-filter>
                 <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
 
                 <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
             </intent-filter>
         </activity>
-
-        <meta-data
-            android:name="preloaded_fonts"
-            android:resource="@array/preloaded_fonts" />
     </application>
 
 </manifest>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context=".MainActivity">
+
+
+    <include
+        layout="@layout/keyboard_liner"
+        android:layout_width="415dp"
+        android:layout_height="728dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="-2dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="2dp" />
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,161 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:paddingTop="11dp"
+    android:background="#B8860B">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textView"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="119dp"
+        android:textSize="50sp"
+        android:text="" />
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/c"
+            android:text="@string/c"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle1"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/split"
+            android:text="@string/split"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle1"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/multiply"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/multiply"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle1"/>
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/seven"
+            android:text="@string/seven"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/eight"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/eight"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/nine"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/nine"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/min"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/min"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/four"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/four"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/five"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/five"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/six"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/six"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/plus"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/plus"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/one"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/one"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/two"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/two"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/three"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/three"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/rav"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/rav"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"/>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/zero"
+            android:layout_weight="2"
+            android:text="@string/zero"
+            tools:ignore="ButtonStyle"
+            style="@style/MyStyle2"
+            android:layout_width="0dp" />
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
     <!-- Base application theme. -->
-    <style name="Theme.Lesson1" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar">
+    <style name="Theme.Calculator" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar">
         <!-- Primary brand color. -->
         <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_200</item>
         <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item>
